# Visage of the Deity, Lesser (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]] or [[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 4]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Mysticism (Domain)|Mysticism]] 3, [[4th Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 321

*As you end your prayer, you can feel the hand of your deity upon you. Your appearance reflects her divine power, and her touch grants you resistance from some of the damage of this world.*

You gain a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma. You also gain resistance to acid 10, cold 10, and electricity 10 if you are good, or resistance to cold 10 and fire 10 if you are evil.
